message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I would like to counteroffer at $175 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand that you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $190. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
Thank you for considering my previous counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $180 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob! I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need to make sure I get a good return on my investment. I'm willing to meet you at $185. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the value you're getting.
I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a final price of $180 for the product.
